channel.title: Side Road USA
channel.description: Side Road USA / Cat Cast Radio Blues and the works Social Media platform for Blues Cat comes at you from off the banks of the Missouri river here in St. Joseph Missouri USA reaching out to all our fans local and beyond.

item.title: Wordjam33 / Kennys Podcast
item.description: Time to time Cat cast radio reaches out around the world in search to "share" on our show platform various podcast creators  We take interest this moment in "Kennys Podcast"  Warning a bit explicit in points ,yet a wonderful show ! enjoy.... dA cAt

item.title: Session 109 Mark Kerr's Blue Nation show
item.description: Listen to Mark each Saturday on KCOR bring you some of the best in Indie artist from around the globe! Check out Mark at his home web www.markkerrltd.com Be sure to listen in to all Mark and his "top rated shows".. Playlist Episode 109 updated Saturday April 18, 2009 Jay Jesse Johnson Z Tribe White Lion The Jimmy Zee Band Phantom Blues Band Vince Agwada Truth Gov't Mule Harlan Flo Chris Hicks Band Ramblin Dawgs Blindstone Tom Principato Willie Stradlin Mark Kerr Rossington Collins Band Larry McCray Scott Henderson Guitar Pete Lance Lopez Mr. Big Blindside Bluesband Vasti Jackson

item.title: Session 21 Blues Cat Jack Show ( the Return)
item.description: That's right the show is back after a long stint of absence. Playlist 1. Cryin for Mercy - Hadden Sayer Band 2. Ain't gonna change my heart - Ron McManaman 3. Redheaded Woman -The border Band 4. Let's make love right now - Locash Cowboys 5. Ocean Blue - My Brave heart 6. Harlan - Jimmy Aldridge 7. When you run - Bus13-Band radio 8. Back to Memphis - Izzy & Chris 9. Hole in the Head - Jessica Horn Band 10. Linda Lu - Stone Brothers 11. I told you once - Dead Guy Blues 12. Eagle Rock my Baby - The bluesbox windy city blues 13. Hard Luck Woman - Clifford & Michaels 14. All Fired up - Mark Easton 15. Mojo Party - Mel Melton & the wicked Mojos 16. Second Nature - Eric Clapton 17. A good Song - Locash Cowboys Enjoy ! be sure to stop by our radio web site www.catcastradiopodcast.com and listen to us at live365. we stream live and the buttons are on the web page. "dA cAt"

item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Praying Lizzard's Road Rash Blues Show / 01-31-09
item.description: Episode 37 updated Saturday January 31, 2009 Rocky Jackson Coco Montoya Blue Onion Chainsaw Dupont Chase The Sun Claudette Miller Dave Munkoff Erica Brown Guitar Shorty Henry Correy Jerry Forney Jimmy Dawkins Joe Pitts Johnny Mannion Kerry Kearney Band Scarlet Runner Scott Henderson Shari Puorto Sweet Suzi & The Blues Experience Terry Knott Mark Kerr The Catillacs The Vinny Dappio Epidemic Willie McBlind Audrey Turner Madison Again Mark Kerr brings to life a show of " true blues " and a rash you won't want salve any to soon !! check out Mark at his website www.markkerrltd.com as well our radio station page www.catcastradiopodcast.com

item.title: Mark Kerr / Blues Nation Show / 10 11 2008
item.description: The #1 Blues online radio show on MSN and Google around the globe and proudly presented here on Cat radio ! Get ready to lay down with Marks show as he brings it to you in true wisdom and "air wave Dj style". This great show airs every saturday on KCOR .. check out this show and all marks shows and get ready ! This weeks set list : 1. Craig Erickson 2. Chris Hicks Band 3.Chris Aaron 4. Bernard Allison 5. Bad Company 6. Black Passat 7. Devon Allmans Honey Tribe 8. King Karma 9. Hardware 10. Eric Gales 11. Blindside Blues Band 12. Maria Daines 13. Frank Marino 14. Lance Lopez 15. Steve Stevens & Dug Pinnick 16. Mothers Finest 17. The Scream 18. Sass Jordan 19. Mark Kerr 20. Lisa Mann 21. Scarlet Runner 22. Truth 23. Jeff Healey 24. Michael Burks 25. Flatout 26. May Hart You can find each artist link on Marks webpage.. stop by and meet them all. www.markkerrltd.com
